BOOKSETTINGS.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this book?
BOOKSETTINGS.leaveBookConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from the authors of this book?
BOOKSETTINGS.policyError: You must accept the rules of the Noetic charter
BOOKSETTINGS.publishConfirm: Are you sure you are making this book public? Its content must respect the rules of the Noetic charter
BOOKSETTINGS.stopPublishingConfirm: Are you sure you want to make this book private?
BOOKSETTINGS.updateConfirm: Are you sure you are publishing this version of the book?

TUTO.0: Welcome to the scenario editor, press "OK" to continue this tutorial or "Skip" to skip it
TUTO.1: You can enter text in the chat bar at the bottom of the screen
TUTO.2: To add an actor, press the "" button in the "actor" section
TUTO.3: To select / deselect him, tap on his avatar in the chat bar
TUTO.4: You can edit an actor by tapping on their avatar in the chat
TUTO.5: To make the chat dynamic, press the "command" section
TUTO.6: Here you can search for commands by pressing the magnifying glass
TUTO.7: Note that you can include variables in your texts with the sign "$"
TUTO.9: You can replay this tutorial by reactivating it in your project settings

rules.0: To use racist, homophobic, sexist or any other politically incorrect subject.
rules.1: To be disrespectful to the reader, to harass or attack him.
rules.4: Use pornographic or extreme violence content.
rules.5: Not to warn readers of offensive content or about a sensitive topic.
rules.6: To disclose private information of other people without consent.
rules.8: Do not mention the authors of the images used. Including the cover!

CHART.intro: It is strictly prohibited in any work:
CHART.outro: Any user who does not respect these rules is liable to a ban.
